response.overview: Simone is a fourth-year high school student who has been targeted for years because of a slight eye tic and an ever-growing problem with ataxophobia. His passion for bees has led him to discover that they are among the most important species for human survival itself, as well as for the protection of biodiversity. Although he is a brilliant boy, his initiative is stifled by the almost daily acts of bullying carried out by his classmate Vincenzo and his group.
response.title: The End
